author: Tatler Singapore
title: Best of Tatler Singapore: The most luxurious Bukit Timah homes with beautiful interiors and lush, exclusive surroundings | Tatler Asia
text:
HOMES
22 Bukit Timah homes that bring together grandeur and comfort
One of Singapore’s most coveted neighbourhoods, Bukit Timah is a haven for those seeking a blend of exclusivity, tranquillity and green surroundings. The neighbourhood’s luxurious homes epitomise refined design, and many interiors mirror the area’s serenity with spacious, airy layouts and an understated design language.
From Good Class Bungalows reimagined with artistic flair to minimalist apartments that frame Bukit Timah’s natural beauty, these 22 exquisite homes bring together grandeur and comfort, offering an inspiring glimpse into the sophisticated lifestyle that defines this prestigious enclave.
Read the full story here.
POWER & PURPOSE
Tatler Most Influential 2025: meet Asia’s most impactful changemakers
Asia is home to some of the world’s largest corporations and most dynamic economies. Companies like Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company (TSMC), Tencent and Banyan Tree Hotels and Resorts that began as local enterprises now rank among global leaders in their sectors.
This economic transformation has been driven by visionary and purpose-driven individuals who have shaped industries, advanced research and innovation, led cultural movements and aided communities in need across the continent.
This month, Tatler launches Tatler Most Influential, its annual reference of top changemakers and leaders.
Read the full story here.
STYLE
Knotty & Nice: an exclusive first look Escentials Holiday 2025 with Tatler
The festive season arrived early for a select group of Tatler’s esteemed guests—particularly those with a keen interest in beauty—who were recently granted the first exclusive preview in Singapore of the Escentials Holiday 2025 collection. In partnership with Tatler, the luxury beauty retailer hosted a fun and spirited event, launching its Christmas campaign with a playful new concept and ensuring its discerning clientele had the ultimate privilege: access before anyone else.
The highly-anticipated annual preview event, which previously catered strictly to media and business partners on a single day, underwent a transformation this year. Escentials decided to inject a “playful twist on tradition”, broadening the guest list while firmly maintaining the exclusivity of the access and privileges.
Read the full story here.
LIFESTYLE
The ultimate Singapore festive list: where to celebrate Christmas and usher in 2026
As the year draws to a spectacular close, Singapore is beginning to showcase itself as the ultimate festive destination, offering everything from grand heritage celebrations and exhilarating new experiences. With the Lion City bringing its significant SG60 anniversary celebrations to a conclusion, the stage is set for an unforgettable Christmas and New Year’s Eve, featuring magnificent installations, show-stopping live entertainment and highly anticipated annual fireworks shows.
Read on for our definitive guide to the essential events, ensuring your end-of-year calendar is as glittering as the Marina Bay skyline. (And yes, we’re already looking ahead for the upcoming Chinese New Year 2026 festivities!)
Read the full story here.
EDITOR'S PICK
With Luminara, CaterCo transforms festive dining into an illuminating experience.
3 Singapore chefs reinterpret the spirit of Maison Martell in exclusive tasting menus in November and December.
The Macallan unveils a refreshed bottle design for its Timeless Collections, created in collaboration with the renowned American graphic designer.
